    • buildFleet

      public static IFleet buildFleet(Scanner in, int n)
      This operation allows the build up of a fleet, given user data
      Parameters:
      in - The scanner to read from
      n - The number of ships of the wanted fleet
      Returns:
      The fleet that has been built

      Returns:
